title: Interpret residual for roadrunner tail length

content.question: Based on the residual, does the regression model overestimate or underestimate the tail length of the roadrunner?

choices.label: Underestimate, because the residual is positive.
Underestimate, because the residual is negative.
Overestimate, because the residual is positive.
Overestimate, because the residual is negative.

content.answer: Underestimate, because the residual is positive.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Construct numerical or graphical representations of distributions.
